price: निःसंदेह वह सबसे महान अल्लाह पर ईमान नहीं रखता था।
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: innahu kāna lā yu'minu bil-lahi al-ʿaẓīmi
